author: peronosphora
content: <@862973562243252234> thanks for the tip about the call and providing the link, I just noticed your post here. Regarding the networking part (questions and feedback) what would be the best way to provide it to you? Here in this thread or how?

author: tersec
content: Nimbus and `nim-libp2p` are separate projects, in general, obviously we work closely together but I might not know that level of detail about `nim-libp2p` implementation strategy

author: asn_d6
content: I think this is a great place to provide feedback. The original authors will also be able to see it.
